name: Standard Single Room
description: A cozy single room with basic amenities.

name: Standard Double Room
description: A comfortable double room suitable for couples.

name: Deluxe Suite
description: An elegant suite with a separate living area and luxurious amenities.

name: Family Room
description: Spacious room suitable for families with children, featuring extra bedding options.

name: Executive Room
description: Well-appointed room with additional amenities for business travelers.

name: Penthouse Suite
description: Luxurious suite located on the top floor with panoramic views and premium services.

name: Junior Suite
description: A stylish suite with a comfortable seating area and modern furnishings.

name: Standard Twin Room
description: Room with two single beds, ideal for friends or colleagues traveling together.

name: Accessible Room
description: Wheelchair-accessible room with specially designed amenities for guests with mobility needs.

name: Honeymoon Suite
description: Romantic suite designed for honeymooners, featuring a jacuzzi and intimate atmosphere.
